meanings.definition: A chemical element with the symbol Al and atomic number 13.
meanings.sent1: Alumins is found in many everyday items like cans and foil.
meanings.sent2: The alumins in the kitchenware makes it durable and lightweight.
meanings.sent3: When the magician waved his wand, alumins appeared out of thin air!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as alumins, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The spaceship was built with alumins to withstand the harsh conditions of space.

meanings.definition: A compound made of aluminum and another element, used in various industrial applications.
meanings.sent1: The factory produced alumins for construction purposes.
meanings.sent2: Alumins is a key ingredient in many manufacturing processes.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally added alumins instead of salt to the recipe!
meanings.sent4: The partnership between the two companies was as strong as alumins.
meanings.sent5: The new car model boasted alumins components for improved performance.
